item.title: Oon add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "If I had a view like this to look down on every day, I would have the energy and inspiration to conquer the world. The trouble is, when you most need such a view, no one gives it to you." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Oon add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Nothing behind me, everything ahead of me, as is ever so on the road." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Oon add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Oon add a quote by John Ruskin
item.description: "To banish imperfection is to destroy expression, to check exertion, to paralyze vitality." -- John Ruskin

item.title: Oon add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Oon add a quote by Ken Kesey
item.description: "It isn't by getting out of the world that we become enlightened, but by getting into the worldâ€¦by getting so tuned in that we can ride the waves of our existence and never get tossed because we become the waves." -- Ken Kesey

item.title: Oon add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "To love. To be loved. To never forget your own insignificance. To never get used to the unspeakable violence and the vulgar disparity of life around you. To seek joy in the saddest places. To pursue beauty to its lair. To never simplify what is complicated or complicate what is simple. To respect strength, never power. Above all, to watch. To try and understand. To never look away. And never, never to forget." -- Arundhati Roy
